content.json:
# SAP LogServ Insights Dashboard

Real-time monitoring of **SAP RISE infrastructure, private cloud edition component** log ingestion and system activity. Use the [Microsoft Sentinel Solution for SAP applications](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/sap/solution-overview) to complete your threat monitoring.

>**💡 Learn More:** Visit our [Ultimate Blog Series: SAP LogServ Integration with Microsoft Sentinel](https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-members/ultimate-blog-series-sap-logserv-integration-with-microsoft-sentinel/ba-p/14126401) to discover advanced integration capabilities and best practices.

**Data Freshness Status**
| 🟢 Fresh (<1h): Current, actively flowing | 🟡 Recent (1-6h): Slightly delayed, acceptable | 🟠 Older (6-24h): May be experiencing delays | 🔴 Stale (>24h): Ingestion may have stopped |

parameters.name: ClzDir
parameters.label: 📁 Log Type
parameters.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where isnotempty(clz_dir)
| summarize Count = count() by clz_dir
| order by Count desc
| project Value = clz_dir, Label = strcat(clz_dir, ' (', Count, ')'), Selected = false

parameters.name: ClzSubDir
parameters.label: 📂 Log Sub-Type
parameters.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where isnotempty(clz_subdir)
| summarize Count = count() by clz_subdir
| order by Count desc
| project Value = clz_subdir, Label = strcat(clz_subdir, ' (', Count, ')'), Selected = false

content.query:
let filteredLogs = SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}';
filteredLogs
| summarize TotalLogs = count()
| project Value = TotalLogs, Label = "📊 Total Events"

let filteredLogs = SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}';
filteredLogs
| summarize UniqueSystems = dcount(host)
| project Value = UniqueSystems, Label = "🖥️ Active Systems"

let filteredLogs = SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}';
filteredLogs
| summarize DataVolumeGB = round(sum(strlen(coalesce(Raw, ""))) / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0), 2)
| project Value = DataVolumeGB, Label = "💾 Data Volume (GB)"

let filteredLogs = SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}';
filteredLogs
| summarize LatestLogTime = max(TimeGenerated)
| extend 
    DataFreshness = case(
        LatestLogTime >= ago(1h), "🟢 Fresh",
        LatestLogTime >= ago(6h), "🟡 Recent",
        LatestLogTime >= ago(24h), "🟠 Older",
        "🔴 Stale"
    )
| project Value = DataFreshness, Label = "🔄 Data Status"

let filteredLogs = SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}';
filteredLogs
| summarize LatestLogTime = max(TimeGenerated)
| extend FormattedTime = strcat(format_datetime(LatestLogTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ' UTC')
| project Value = FormattedTime, Label = "⏰ Most Recent Data"

SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}'
| make-series LogCount = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1h
content.title: 📈 Log Volume Timeline

content.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}'
| where isnotempty(clz_subdir)
| summarize LogCount = count() by clz_subdir
| order by LogCount desc
| project SubType = clz_subdir, Count = LogCount
| take 10
content.title: 📂 Sub-Type Distribution (Top 10)

content.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}'
| where isnotempty(clz_dir)
| summarize LogCount = count() by clz_dir
| order by LogCount desc
| project Classification = clz_dir, Count = LogCount
content.title: 🏗️ Log Type Distribution

content.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}'
| summarize 
    LogCount = count(),
    LatestActivity = max(TimeGenerated),
    DataSizeGB = round(sum(strlen(coalesce(Raw, ""))) / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0), 3),
    UniqueTypes = dcount(clz_dir),
    UniqueSubTypes = dcount(clz_subdir)
    by host
| order by LogCount desc
| extend 
    ActivityStatus = case(
        LatestActivity >= ago(1h), "🟢 Active",
        LatestActivity >= ago(6h), "🟡 Recent",
        "🔴 Inactive"
    ),
    FormattedLatest = strcat(format_datetime(LatestActivity, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ' UTC')
| project 
    ['🖥️ System'] = host,
    ['📈 Event Count'] = LogCount,
    ['💾 GB'] = DataSizeGB,
    ['📁 Types'] = UniqueTypes,
    ['📂 Sub-Types'] = UniqueSubTypes,
    ['⏰ Latest'] = FormattedLatest,
    ['📊 Status'] = ActivityStatus
| take 15
content.title: 🖥️ System Analysis by Log Types

content.query:
SAPLogServ_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= {TimeRange:start}
| where '{ClzDir}' == '*' or clz_dir == '{ClzDir}'
| where '{ClzSubDir}' == '*' or clz_subdir == '{ClzSubDir}'
| where isnotempty(clz_dir) and isnotempty(clz_subdir)
| summarize 
    LogCount = count(),
    UniqueHosts = dcount(host),
    LatestActivity = max(TimeGenerated),
    DataSizeGB = round(sum(strlen(coalesce(Raw, ""))) / (1024.0 * 1024.0 * 1024.0), 3)
    by clz_dir, clz_subdir
| order by LogCount desc
| extend 
    ActivityStatus = case(
        LatestActivity >= ago(1h), "🟢 Active",
        LatestActivity >= ago(6h), "🟡 Recent",
        "🔴 Inactive"
    ),
    FormattedLatest = strcat(format_datetime(LatestActivity, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ' UTC')
| project 
    ['📁 Log Type'] = clz_dir,
    ['📂 Sub-Type'] = clz_subdir,
    ['📈 Events'] = LogCount,
    ['🖥️ Hosts'] = UniqueHosts,
    ['� GB'] = DataSizeGB,
    ['⏰ Latest'] = FormattedLatest,
    ['📊 Status'] = ActivityStatus
| take 20
content.title: 🔍 Detailed Type/Sub-Type Analysis
